Arcane Blade.name: Arcane Blade
Arcane Blade.flavor: You snatch arcane power from the Feywild, wreathing your dagger in energy.
Arcane Blade.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Arcane Blade.special: Choose cold, fire, lightning, or thunder whenever you use this power. Your choice determines the power’s damage type.

No More Secrets.name: No More Secrets
No More Secrets.flavor: You find the weak point in an enemy’s defenses and exploit it.
No More Secrets.effect: The target gains vulnerable 10 cold, vulnerable 10 fire, vulnerable 10 lightning, or vulnerable 10 thunder (your choice) until the end of your next turn.

Glaring Wound.name: Glaring Wound
Glaring Wound.flavor: Your blade cuts deep, leaving a gaping wound.
Glaring Wound.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Glaring Wound.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).
Glaring Wound.effect: The target gains vulnerability 10 to attacks with the weapon keyword (save ends).
